review: Pretty incredible that something so sleek can do so much. I'm overly impressed. Hooked it up to an older lg lcd tv hanging on bedroom wall that is NOT a smart tv. Didn't want to mess with adding a shelf for blue ray player. This offers a world of apps as well as high quality streaming video through Amazon. Seriously underpriced for what it is.
author: Travis Mettenbrink

review: It's okay. I would love it if with my Prime Membership I was able to get more shows free, i.e. the TV show Once Upon a Time is a pay per view. I am already paying for a yearly subscription for Prime. I would have to get HULU plus at $7.99 a month to not pay a per view fee. I thought that getting the Fire Stick would be less expensive than my cable subscriber. Not the case. In order to view the shows that I usually watch I would end up having to get so many different subscriptions it would cost me more in the long run. My fiancee found a show he liked, he thought it was included with Prime, it was, the first episode only, if he wanted to see the rest it would cost him +$100.00....nuts!!! I like that I can load albums and listen via the fire stick. The remote is easy to operate once you can finally get the battery compartment open to load the batteries (really Amazon?, that design is insane!) we had to go to YouTube.com to see if there was a 'trick' to opening the compartment....and there was, a few, that tells you something. After waiting the longest time I have ever waited for an order, over 2 weeks, I am under-impressed overall.
